org.apache.solr.handler.component

Class PivotFacetProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.solr.request.SimpleFacets
      • org.apache.solr.handler.component.PivotFacetProcessor

  • public class PivotFacetProcessor
extends SimpleFacets
    Processes all Pivot facet logic for a single node -- both non-distrib, and per-shard

    • Method Detail

      • process

        public SimpleOrderedMap<List<NamedList<Object>>> process(String[] pivots)
                                                  throws IOException
        Processes all of the specified FacetParams.FACET_PIVOT strings, generating a completel response tree for each pivot. The values in this response will either be the complete tree of fields and values for the specified pivot in the local index, or the requested refinements if the pivot params include the PivotFacet.REFINE_PARAM
        Throws:
        IOException
